snippet: Separately, the Crutchfield twins have made two of the year’s best and most affecting indie rock albums: “American Weekend,” by Waxahatchee, and the self-titled debut album by Swearin’.
abstract: Twin sisters Allison and Katie Crutchfield continue their musical journey after forming band after band, building a series of cult followings; at age 23, the twins have separately made two of the year's best and most affecting indie rock albums, American Weekend by Waxahatchee, Katie's solo project, and the self-titled debut of Allison's band, Swearin'.
lead_paragraph: Separately, the Crutchfield twins have made two of the year’s best and most affecting indie rock albums: “American Weekend,” by Waxahatchee, and the self-titled debut album by Swearin’.

headline.seo: Allison and Katie Crutchfield, Twins, Go Separate Ways
